reg:regulation.reg:title: Conditions and Limitations on University Property Tax Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The following conditions and limitations apply for the purposes of section 54 of the University Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: property that is held or used for residential or rental accommodation purposes is not exempt from taxation unless the accommodation is held or used

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: primarily for the accommodation of students, visiting professors, visiting scientists, visiting scholars, visiting postdoctoral fellows or visiting medical residents,
for the president or to meet a requirement of a faculty member's appointment to a specified position at the university, or
as university apartments rented primarily to the full time university faculty or staff for a stay of no more than 3 years.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the University Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 468, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 71]
